reviews.review_msg: Cher's Exploration A is very disrespectful to Indigenous peoples, as it asks you to self-insert yourself like an activist rather than show respect. I will never understand why she encourages long, drawn-out land acknowledgements. Her encouragement of activism in class wasted a lot of time. Not easy to talk to if you are not an activist teacher.

EDUC 400 is a journey that asks you to think about the type of educator YOU want to be.  The profs can't do that work for you.  Thankfully, Cher is very approachable, caring, and supportive of her students.  She tries her best to connect with everyone in her classes on their level.  Trust the process, and if it isn't working for you... talk to her.

I took Education 400 with Cher this year; we did many of our activities Mundy Park. Many of the activities made no sense, like one time when we were painting rocks for a healing circle. This and many other activities did not help me develop my teaching skills. There is no schedule or syllabus for this course, which made it very difficult. I passed.

I sincerely think that she is an angel. She loves and inspires her students in depth. I never ever had this genuine professor in my life. My presentation in class changed my life and she supported me with lots of feedbacks. I hope SFU gives her many courses so many students can take her courses.
Nicest prof ever when I did this last spring. If she teaches again, take her.

Cher is an amazing prof. You have to work hard and put in the effort, but she definitely rewards the hard work. EXTREMELY student centered and will do what works best for her students, not what works best for her. I wish she taught more often! If you see her name on an outline, take the course--you won't regret it!

A very caring professor.  Cher really wants her students to get the most out of the class and expects full participation.  Do the readings, record your reflections after every class and offer your perspectives - this is a challening class in a great environment and will give you a strong foundation for PDP.
Great Prof ever!!!!! SO GOOD!!!She cares about all her students, she knows what she is teaching, she knows how to teach!!!! Great Prof!! I wish she can teach all my classes!!!!!

The most amazing proff I've ever had in my university career, I honestly wish she taught all my classes! She genuinely cares about all her students and is always looking for ways to self improve. i loved her!
This instructor knows her stuff. I've never worked so hard for a course, but she worked harder than any of us. LOTS of feedback. Very caring and community minded. Wish she taught all our courses!

Awesome prof! Wish she would teach more classes. Truly interested and concerned about her students. Knows her stuff and gives practical assignemnts. You will have fun while you learn! I'm doing a tech. educ. minor because of her. Thanks Cher!

TAKE THIS COURSE FROM CHER! My friends took with others, they were okay, but Cher is awesome! Her partner is great too - take any courses they teach. Both are caring, compassionate and competent instructors. I keep looking for them to teach more PDP courses! CM
Distance Ed course. Very helpful & quick to respond to ?'s. Tests are extremely hard, but assignments are easy. Great prof!
Simply the best. She should have more courses at SFU!
What can I say... She's better than those TA whom you see every week. You wouldn't believe that it's only a distance edu. course... SHE'S GREAT!
Best TM ever, 1 day max turn around on papers. Friendly and helpful.
